title: HUGE**Dishwasher**garage pkg**storage**porch**10 min to the T**
posting_body: ['Spacious 4 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath apartment (2nd + 3rd floor) in East Arlington / Arlington Line $3,750', 'Arlington / Arlington Line / Other', 'Available:', '8/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#174682', 'Apartment Summary', 'Spacious 4 bedroom 1.5 bathroom apartment on the second and third floor of a two-fam home in East Arlington.', 'Spanning two floors, this unit features a living room, dining room, study/office space, hardwood floors throughout, a large eat-in kitchen with dishwasher and new gas stove, front and back porches.', 'Laundry hook-ups and extra storage available in the basement.', 'Garage and off-street parking space for 3-4 cars is included.', 'Located about a block from Massachusetts Ave with easy access to Rt. 2, Alewife station on the red line, and MBTA bus routes to Harvard Square.', '(Reference #174682)', 'Features', 'Washer hook-up in basement, Dryer hook-up in basement, Cable Ready.', '1 min minute walk to Major Bus Routes.', '12 minute walk to the T (Alewife).', 'Garage and Off Street Parking Available.', 'Two-Family structure, Wood Frame architecture, on the 2nd and 3rd floor, Huge, 2 floors square feet.', 'Apartment Details', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Location:', 'Arlington/Arlington Line', 'Available:', 'August 01, 2022', 'Bath:', '1.5', 'Bedrooms:', '4', 'Reference:', '#174682', 'Kitchen:', 'Eat in Kitchen.', ' Separate dining room.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Natural Gas Stove, Dishwasher.', 'Contact Information', 'Agent:', 'Peter Kasseris', 'Text:', '617-855-5151', 'Please mention reference #', '174682', 'Email:', 'HIT REPLY', 'for questions or showing request.', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', '** Pictures are of model unit, and furnished appliances may vary.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
